body:
Comment 3: 
It's also very memory intensive. It takes far more ram than the generated file size, at
least 10 times as much and probably much more. You could be pounding on the VM system.
You don't say how much RAM your machine has. 

If you run it with 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 cores and see the system time go up very nonlinearly,
it's a system resource you're running out of or the kernel is multitasking badly. I
doubt this is a 6l problem specifically.
